code_examples.code:
def test_iter_modules():
    from pytest import import_module
    from my_pkg.utils import get_modules
    with import_module('my_pkg'):
        modules = get_modules(__path__[0])
        assert len(modules) > 0

def test_find_package():
    from pytest import import_path
    from my_pkg.utils import find_package
    with import_path('my_package'):
        assert find_package() is not None
